actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of employees contributions by employers to certain insurance plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of an employee amounts contributed by an employer to or under any insurance plan which provides property and liability insurance coverage for his employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of employees contributions by employers to certain insurance plans.
